Title: Rest and Ricklaxation
Writer: Justin Roiland (created by), Dan Harmon (created by), Tom Kauffman, Jane Becker (executive story editor), Jessica Gao (executive story editor), Sarah Carbiener (story editor), Erica Rosbe (story editor), Tanner Tananbaum (staff writer)
Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer, Sarah Chalke
Plot: Following a stressful adventure, Rick and Morty go on a break to a spa where they remove their toxins, which in turn take a form of their own.
